title: 30MIN full body pilates workout (no equipment)
description:
a 30-minute pilates class designed to make you feel energised and ready for the day ahead! Low-impact movements to help with flexibility, strength, and mobility. 

Hope you have fun doing this workout! 
Love you all, Lidi x

♡ MORE OF ME ♡
TikTok | http://bit.ly/3jKm4Bo
Instagram | http://bit.ly/3jLe4A4
Youtube | http://bit.ly/3vvvCCP
Email | hi@lidiavmera.com

disclaimer: 
I am sharing my personal workouts. If you experience any type of pain or discomfort during this workout, stop immediately, modify as necessary and/or rejoin me on another video. By implementing this workout in your routine, you agree and understand Lidiavmera limited will not be held responsible or liable for any injury that may occur as a result of this workout video.
channelDescription:
what a journey it is to understanding how to feel our best, so hey, lets do it together ♡ sharing my life as a 23 year-old living in London & my at-home workouts with you as a certified Pilates instructor (L3 pilates mat instructor) 
hope you stick around 🤍
ly all millions
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/Zw7zhaBpSPU" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: I fell in love with Pilates because of Lidia. I take long walks and do Pilates everyday. Lidia's 20 minute thigh workout is VERY effective. Love this channel.
thank you for doing a 30 minute workout, i'd love to see more of these longer workout videos!

I’m incredibly sick and have muscle aches and chills :( but I can’t wait to get back to this 💔

Great work to everyone else sticking to her vids too 🤍
This was challenging, but just enough that I didn’t want to quit half way through. Thank you Lidia. I check your channel daily for new videos ❤
Thank you so much Lidia! I´ve been here since the 200.000 Followers and you're my comfort-Youtuber <3 I appreciate you very much!
